text: 💖 Love what you do, and greatness will follow. The only way to do extraordinary work is to be deeply passionate about it.
author: Steve Jobs

text: 🚀 Innovate boldly! True leaders set the pace with original thinking — be the one who shapes the future, not follows it.
author: Steve Jobs

text: ⏳ Your time is priceless — don’t spend it living someone else’s dream. Take charge and build your own legacy!
author: Steve Jobs

text: 🔥 Stay hungry. Stay foolish. Keep learning, keep chasing your dreams — the world belongs to the relentless.
author: Steve Jobs

text: 🏆 True glory isn’t in never falling — it’s in rising stronger each time you fall. Resilience is your superpower!
author: Nelson Mandela

text: 💪 Stop talking. Start doing. Action transforms dreams into reality — today is the day to begin!
author: Walt Disney

text: 🌈 Predictability is boring. Embrace the unknown — that’s where life gets exciting, and growth begins.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: 🙏 Appreciate what you have — gratitude brings abundance. Focus on your blessings and they will multiply.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: 🎶 Life is unfolding now — not someday. Make each moment count while you build your dreams.
author: John Lennon
